Package design.aeonic.nifty.api.recipe

All Superinterfaces:

    canCraftInDimensions, getGroup, getId, getRemainingItems, getSerializer, getToastSymbol, getType, isIncomplete, matches

  • Method Details

    • canConsumeEnergy

      default boolean canConsumeEnergy()
      Whether this recipe can require an energy cost. If true, getEnergyCost() can still return 0; it can be specified by recipe instances if desired.

    • getEnergyCost

      default long getEnergyCost()
      The energy cost of this recipe, in units total (not per tick).

    • hasProcessingTime

      default boolean hasProcessingTime()
      Whether this recipe takes time to complete. If true, getProcessingTime() can still return 0; it can be specified by recipe instances if desired.

    • getProcessingTime

      default int getProcessingTime()
      The time it takes to complete this recipe, in ticks.

    • getMaxFluidInputs

      default int getMaxFluidInputs()
      The maximum number of fluid input ingredients for this recipe type. If greater than 0, getFluidIngredients() is expected not to return null. However, the number of ingredients for a given recipe instance can be less than this value.

    • getMaxFluidOutputs

      default int getMaxFluidOutputs()
      The maximum number of fluid outputs for this recipe type (think machine output slots).

    • getMaxItemInputs

      default int getMaxItemInputs()
      The maximum number of item input ingredients for this recipe type. If greater than 0, getItemIngredients() is expected not to return null. However, the number of ingredients for a given recipe instance can be less than this value.

    • getMaxItemOutputs

      default int getMaxItemOutputs()
      The maximum number of item outputs for this recipe type (think machine output slots).

    • getFluidIngredients

      @Nullable default List<FluidIngredient> getFluidIngredients()
      A list of this recipe's fluid ingredients. If null, the recipe does not use fluids.

    • getItemIngredients

      @Nullable default List<ItemIngredient> getItemIngredients()
      A list of this recipe's item ingredients. If null, the recipe has no item ingredients.

    • getFluidOutputs

      @Nonnull default FluidOutputSet getFluidOutputs()
      This recipe's possible fluid outputs, in the form of a FluidOutputSet.

    • getItemOutputs

      @Nonnull default ItemOutputSet getItemOutputs()
      This recipe's possible item outputs, in the form of an ItemOutputSet.

    • getIngredients

      default net.minecraft.core.NonNullList<net.minecraft.world.item.crafting.Ingredient> getIngredients()
